Author: henning
Title: CERN releases analysis of LHC shutdown incident, confirms restart by 2009

Author: gaius
Content: I flew recently, at Gatwick they say "no containers of liquids bigger than 100ml". At the other end they said "no more than 1L of liquids in total". But, if you were working in a team, you could get any amount of any liquid you wanted aboard.

Author: MaysonL
Content: Grades are a disaster: they incentivize kids to work for grades rather than for love, which leads them to be employees rather than founders.
